MajorClaims.MC1: spending the budget for space exploration is an important activity to save living of humanity in the future
MajorClaims.MC2: spending budget for space exploring is not the waste budget

Claims.C1: it may helps to save civilization of humanity
Claims.C2: it is very significant to find a new place for living in other planets
Claims.C3: space exploration will use as a military power for many countries

Premises.P1: Many governments believe that space exploration is an activity that wastes the budget
Premises.P2: the essential challenge of humanity in the future would be the discovery of a new place for the living
Premises.P3: In during history, our planet is threatening by many of other planets or stars and it is an enormous danger for living of humanity
Premises.P4: In 20th century, although human being succeeded to achieve out of space by means of new technologies such as rockets, but finding a new place for living in another planet is impossible until now
Premises.P5: In the future, many countries will try to prevent attach of other countries by using and invention new missiles
Premises.P6: Both countries tried to send man to the moon and show their power to each other
Premises.P7: In the past, the space race happened between the United Stated and the Soviet Union
Premises.P8: Space exploration has used as a tools for military power in the cold war
